title: Random Permaban with no email telling me why
body: I was sitting on the home screen after just playing a game and when i tried to click play nothing worked, so I restarted my client, and it said I was permabanned? I checked my email and nothing was there to tell me why, and yes I've checked the spam and trash folders. Even logged into the site to make sure I was checking the right email. My question is why was my account permanently deleted? I had a 25 game chat restriction but even if I was toxic to someone why would you delete my account? I've spent like $250 on it, what happened to maybe a 2-3 week ban at first???? Instant permanent ban? Really? Nor have I ever used a third party client or anything, and I figured it would tell me if that was what my account was banned for.

Are you joking? Literally, the only third party application I have ever used is Wooxy, which I'm not claiming is harmless because it changes ingame textures, but how does that make me a scripter? Scripting is something that plays for you, and all Wooxy does is change ingame textures/HUD.
He's not talking about Wooxy.
Do you mind telling me what he is talking about then, so I can uninstall it to avoid being banned on my other accounts?
Telling you which script they detected would hardly be wise since Riot needs to keep as much information about their detection process secret to maintain any sort of edge.

Support may not tell you which specific program you used that was the one which flagged your account.  Mirageofpenguins was kind enough to tell you when it occurred, but often, players are not even told that information, as the less information the scripters find out, the less likely they are to evade Riot's script-detection methods.  

Anything you use that interacts with the client/game in any way has the potential to cause trouble.  Here's a [list of programs](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt) compiled by Wuks (that brilliant chap one comment above) that might give you an idea of some of the sorts of programs that are not allowed.  While it's not all-inclusive, as new programs are being written every day, and there's no possible way that all of them can be accounted for, it does give reasons listed as to why some of them are considered forbidden.  Perhaps it will give you a bit of a clue as to what sort of things you might want to avoid using on your other accounts.

It could take a little time to receive your email. I'd wait a day, then submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more information. Before you do that though, make sure the correct email is verified by going to your profile on the top right of this page and going to **Settings**.
Let me also add that I had verified my email immediately after receiving the notification that I was banned. Will I still not get to know why?
Give it time first, could just be a delayed email. If not, player support will definitely help you out.
